mapper.insert: insert into chas_yw_yybb (id, baqid, bbhj, bbnr, lrsj, xgsj, isdel, baqmc, sfqy, qyid, qymc) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bbhj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bbnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfqy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update chas_yw_yybb set baqid = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bbhj = #{bbhj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bbnr = #{bbnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lrsj = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xgsj = #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, baqmc = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfqy = #{sfqy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qyid = #{qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qymc = #{qymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, baqid, bbhj, bbnr, lrsj, xgsj, isdel, baqmc, sfqy, qyid, qymc from chas_yw_yybb where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isdel = 0
